metadata.title: CVE-2024-9486 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A security issue was discovered in the Kubernetes Image Builder versions <=v0.1.37 where default credentials are enabled during the image buildprocess. Virtual machine images built using the Proxmox provider do notdisable these default credentials, and nodes using the resulting images maybe accessible via these default credentials. The credentials can be used togain root access. Kubernetes clusters are only affected if their nodes useVM images created via the Image Builder project with its Proxmox provider.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
